thresholds.spectral_centroid_deviation_max_percent: NOT USEFUL — too much variance in GOOD samples
thresholds.rms_deviation_max_percent: NOT USEFUL — too much variance in GOOD samples
thresholds.mfcc_production_note: MFCC is content-dependent. Same-text calibration threshold is 0.008 but production builds with different text produce ~0.035 for same voice. Production threshold 0.06 allows content variance.

notes.catches: Wrong provider voice, major voice character shift (Resemble on short content)
notes.does_not_catch: Subtle within-provider quality issues (bad Fish generation with correct pitch/timbre but wrong prosody)
notes.content_dependence: MFCC cosine distance varies by content — different phoneme distributions shift MFCC means. F0 is content-independent.
notes.human_review: MANDATORY — automated metrics cannot replace human ear for prosody/naturalness
